dct_title_s: General map of the North west Territories, including Manitoba shewing Dominion lands
dct_alternative_sm: General map of part of the North-West Territories including the province of Manitoba shewing Dominion land surveys to 31st December, 1882 / compiled & drawn by J. Johnston.
dct_description_sm: 1 map : color ; 73 x 110 cm, on sheet 85 x 120 cm
Shows subdivision and outline survey areas, townships and ranges, Indian reserves, mounted police stations, etc.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
At head of title: Dominion of Canada.
Signed by Lindsay Russell, Surveyor General, Dominion Land Office.
Ms. notes in black ink in margins as to revisions and cost of "engraving this map in the best style". Signed: I.I.
On verso, written by hand: Dominion of Canada 1882.
